org.grouplens.lenskit.util

Interface Index

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Indexer
    Deprecated. 
    Use IdIndexMapping instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface Index
extends Serializable
    An index mapping long IDs to consecuitive 0-based integers. The indexes fall in the range [0,getObjectCount()). This is useful to index arrays, matrices, etc. by user or item IDs. Indexes are serializable.

    • Method Detail

      • getIndex

        int getIndex(long id)
        Deprecated. 
        Get the index of an id. If the id is not in the index, returns a negative number.
        Parameters:
        id - The id to query.
        Returns:
        The id's index or a negative value if the id does not exist.

      • getId

        long getId(int idx)
        Deprecated. 
        Get the id for an index.
        Parameters:
        idx - The index of the ID to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The ID for the given idx.

      • getObjectCount

        int getObjectCount()
        Deprecated. 
        Get the number of IDs in the index.
        Returns:
        The number of indexed ids.

      • getIds

        LongList getIds()
        Deprecated. 
        Get the list of IDs.
        Returns:
        The list of (unique) IDs in the index.

      • convertArrayToVector

        MutableSparseVector convertArrayToVector(double[] values)
        Deprecated. 
        This method is used to convert arrays to sparse arrays. It takes an array of `double` values corresponding to the ids interned in the index and converts it to a sparse vector whose keys are the IDs.
        Parameters:
        values - A array of double value.
        Returns:
        A new sparse vector that is converted from the Array.
